body.name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Gel-Cream Face Moisturizer to Hydrate & Smooth Extra-Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 28 - March 6 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 1.7-ounce jar of Neutrogena Hydro Boost Daily gel-cream face moisturizer with hyaluronic acid quenches extra-dry skin
The moisturizing gel formula provides rapid hydration to skin, leaving it looking smooth and supple by restoring skin's natural barrier against moisture loss
Hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin, attracts moisture and locks it in
Daily hydrating face moisturizer features a non-comedogenic formula that is oil-free, dye-free, and fragrance-free and is from a dermatologist-recommended brand
The rich face lotion relieves intense dryness by providing long-lasting moisturizing power. This hyaluronic acid moisturizer is the perfect addition to your at-home hydrating self-care routine
body.description: Use Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Gel-Cream Moisturizer to instantly quench and provide long-lasting moisture relief for your extra-dry skin. This daily facial lotion helps quench extra-dry skin and keeps it looking smooth, supple, and hydrated day after day. The unique gel-cream formula absorbs quickly like a gel, and has the long lasting moisturizing power of a cream. It is formulated with hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin, attracts moisture and locks it in. This moisturizer formula for dry skin results in more supple, healthy-looking, and smooth looking skin. From a Dermatologist Recommended Brand, this gel-cream face lotion is oil-, dye-, and fragrance-free and non-comedogenic. It can be worn alone or under makeup. Add this hyaluronic acid gel cream moisturizer to your daily at-home hydrating self care routine

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #19,926 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #466 in Face Moisturizers

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel-Cream for Extra Dry Skin At a Glance: Oil-free and smooth to the touch Absorbs quickly into skin Lightweight and non-sticky Instantly quenches skin Hydration is the Key to Healthy Skin that Glows from Within: This new lightweight gel absorbs quickly to nourish dehydrated, dry skin. It delivers vital hydration, which is the source of glowing skin, whenever you need it. So your skin will stay hydrated and smooth, with a healthy-looking glow.

The Science of Hydration The Neutrogena Hydro Boost Collection renews skin’s hydration levels by replenishing water and strengthening skin's moisture barrier, resulting in hydrated, smooth, supple skin. Purified Hyaluronic Acid Naturally found in the skin, hydrating hyaluronic acid acts as a sponge for dry skin cells, holding up to 1,000 times its weight in water. These formulas with Hyaluronic Acid release hydration back into the skin all day. Olive Extract Known for its moisturizing and nutrient-rich qualities, it is a complex combination of fatty acids, which is similar to skin’s natural moisture shield. These formulas with Olive Extract help strengthen the skin’s moisture barrier and protect against excessive moisture loss.

Meet the New Face of Skin Hydration Start and end your day with Neutrogena Hydro Boost. Apply it daily under makeup for an oil-free, smooth complexion. Then use it at night for more hydration benefits. So you can wake up with your skin looking refreshed.

See the Full Line of Neutrogena Hydro Boost Products Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel is a unique, lightweight water gel that instantly quenches and continuously releases hydration into skin all day long. Recommended for all skin types. Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel-Cream for Extra Dry Skin Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel-Cream for Extra Dry Skin is a fragrance-free gel-cream that relieves intense dryness and help restore skin's natural barrier against moisture loss. Recommended for extra dry skin. Neutrogena Hydro Boost Eye Gel Cream Neutrogena Hydro Boost Eye Gel Cream is a refreshing, fragrance-free gel-cream specifically designed to smooth the skin around the eye area. Recommended for all skin types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, it's a great moisturizer and it dries quickly with no stickiness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is so light! It also works great. Sometimes my face is really dry, especially during my night routine. I use this at night when my face is really dry and geez.. it feels so great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So worth it! (This is the gel-cream!)
reviews.reviewText: Per the other reviews, this is the "gel-cream" not the hydro gel. There are several varieties of this product available in stores and here on Amazon. The jars look nearly identical so pay attention to the fine print.I was recommended this product for those with DRY skin (For reference, I am 30 and have always had dry, peeling skin and breakouts).I LOVE the way this feels. I use it nightly, after my CeraVe face wash and witch hazel/rose water toner, and my face feels very clean and smooth and supple. The dryness and peeling issues are gone. My face looks and feels smoother. Even after waking up the next morning, it still feels good. This stuff is the bomb. Will continue to buy when this tub runs out. So good and so worth the price! (And the fact that it's a Prime Pantry item is a great bonus.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have always purchased Clinique Moisture Surge for my dry sensitive skin. I decided to try something a little less pricey. I read a review of this in a magazine and decided to try it. It does not disappoint. Great long lasting moisturizer. This will be my new "go to".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like La Mer But Better
reviews.reviewText: Let's be honest, people. If we had toilet paper money, we wouldn't be reading (let alone writing) Amazon reviews. So in a world where we are all generally pinching pennies, this cream is frickin the game over end game. If I had $10 million burning a hole in my wallet I'd probably rather find some La Mer or other fancypants cream instead. But til then, I'ma bathe my own face up in this cream

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Es increíble la calidad de este producto, una vez aplicado se siente la frescura e hidratación en la piel… me encanta

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Neutrogena face moisturizer without box and instructions
reviews.reviewText: I received this moisturizer product today without box or instructions paper and no explanation date. I was very disappointed !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No More Dryness or Flakiness!
reviews.reviewText: This is a lifesaver for my dry, sensitive skin. My skin has been getting increasingly sensitive over the last few years. The face wash and lotion I was using to keep my skin clear was also making my cheeks and forehead dry and flaky so I started looking for new products.I'm still looking for the perfect face wash, but this is my is go-to lotion. It absorbs easily and works well under makeup. Since I switched to a gentler face wash, this lotion in the morning, and a lotion mask at night, I don't get any dryness or flakiness unless the weather is particularly bad.My skin has never felt better. Using products better suited for my skin has also decreased blemishes. I'm on my second jar, and as long as the formula (and my skin) stays the same, I will keep buying.
